name: tmuxy
description: A tmux terminal wrapper - available as Tauri app or web server

scripts.docker:attach:dev: docker exec -it tmuxy-dev tmux attach-session -t dev
scripts.docker:attach:tmuxy: docker exec -it tmuxy-dev tmux attach-session -t tmuxy
scripts.start: pm2 delete tmuxy-dev 2>/dev/null; pm2 start ./scripts/dev.sh --name tmuxy-dev --cwd /workspace
